attributes.action: Allow bus passes for 60year olds in England the same as Scotland and Wales
attributes.additional_details: My name is John Dawson I live in Stockport as I say I turned 60 on 7th September 2016
attributes.background: I don't think it's fair that I now I've reached the age of 60 that I cannot get a bus pass until a woman of my exact same age gets state pension is feel that people in England are being discriminated against after all we are the United Kingdom are we not
